dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
C. Cortes
C. Burges
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of images of handwritten digits, with ten target categories corresponding to each digit (i.e., 0 â€“ 9). Each image is greyscale and 28x28 pixels in size and contains a single handwritten digit. The dataset contains a total of 60,000 training images and 10,000 test images.
dcterms:title: MNIST Dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: The CIFAR-10 dataset consists of 50,000 color images in training data and 10,000 color images for testing. Each image is 32x32 pixels in size. The ten image categories are airplane, automobile, bird, cat, deer, dog, frog, horse, ship, and truck.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10 Dataset
